summary: VIBRATION IN THE FRONT (WORSE ON THE RIGHT) OF THE VEHICLE.  WAS TOLD BY SALESPERSON, CAR HAD BEEN SITTING A WHILE AND SHOULD DRIVE OUT, AFTER 8 MONTHS AND NUMEROUS VISITS TO THE DEALER, I WAS TOLD THAT THIS WAS THE NATURE OF THE VEHICLE. WHILE DRIVING, THE THERE IS NO FRONT PASSENGER, YOU CAN SEE THE SEAT SHAKING !!!  I HAVE SECURED A LEMON LAW ATTORNEY !!!  *AK
